name.type.description: The content type of the generated QR code, such as 'link', 'text', etc.

name.failure.description: The failure status of the task

name.failureReason.description: The reason for the task failure

name.traceId.description: The trace ID of the task

name.size.description: The size of the QR code to be generated

name.createdAt.description: The date and time when the QR code was generated

name.pixelStyle.description: The pixel style of the QR code to be generated

name.startImageUrl.description: The seed for the QR code to be generated

name.videoUrl.description: The seed for the QR code to be generated

name.endImageUrl.description: The seed for the QR code to be generated

name.paddingLevel.description: The padding level of the QR code to be generated

name.paddingNoise.description: The padding noise of the QR code to be generated

name.content.description: The content of the QR code to be generated

name.ecl.description: The error correction level of the QR code to be generated

name.position.description: The position of the QR code to be generated

name.rotate.description: The rotation of the QR code to be generated

name.enhancement.description: Advanced settings for the QR code to be generated

name.loop.description: Advanced settings for the QR code to be generated

name.aspectRatio.description: The aspect ratio of the QR code to be generated

name.markerShape.description: The marker shape of the QR code to be generated

name.subMarker.description: The sub marker of the QR code to be generated

name.qrw.description: The name of the QR code generator

name.steps.description: The number of steps to generate the QR code

name.preset.description: The preset for the QR code to be generated

name.lumaBot.description: The name of the Luma video generator

name.contentImageUrl.description: The content image URL of the QR code to be generated

description.loop.message: Enable looping for the generated video.

description.enhancement.message: Enable the enhancement for input prompts if you're unsure how to write prompt text.

description.custom.message: Enable this button if you want to upload your own video to extend the video.

description.startImageUrl.message: URL of the start frame image, which will be the first frame of the generated video.

description.videoUrl.message: Upload the URL of the custom extended video, which will be the video for extension.

description.endImageUrl.message: URL of the end frame image, which will be the last frame of the generated video.

description.prompt.message: Prompt text for generating Luma videos

status.pending.description: The pending status of the task

status.processing.description: The processing status of the task

placeholder.prompt.message: Enter the prompt text for the style of the video to be generated, e.g. Astronauts shuttle from space to volcano
placeholder.prompt.description: Placeholder text in the prompt field

placeholder.content.message: Enter the content for the QR code to be generated, e.g. https://www.google.com
placeholder.content.description: Placeholder text in the content field

button.generate.description: Button text to generate Luma video

button.uploadStartImageUrl.description: Button text to upload a QR code image

button.uploadVideoUrl.description: Button text to upload a QR code video

button.uploadEndImageUrl.description: Button text to upload a QR code image

message.uploadQr.message: Upload QR code image to generate an artistic QR code that matches the QR content

message.promptPlaceholder.message: Please enter a sentence describing the image to generate, e.g., a cute cat. Additional parameters will override default preset parameters.

message.uploadReferencesExceed.message: You can upload up to 5 images
message.uploadReferencesExceed.description: Error message when the uploaded image count exceeds the limit

message.uploadReferencesSuccess.description: Success message when an image is uploaded successfully

message.uploadReferencesError.message: Image upload failed, please try again later
message.uploadReferencesError.description: Error message when image upload fails

message.startTaskSuccess.description: Success message when task is started successfully

message.startTaskFailed.message: Failed to initiate task, please contact the administrator
message.startTaskFailed.description: Error message when drawing task initiation fails

message.usedUp.message: Your credits are exhausted, please purchase more credits to continue using
message.usedUp.description: Message when credits are used up

message.generating.description: Message when the image is being generated

message.downloadVideo.description: Message displayed while the image is being generated

message.extendVideo.description: Message displayed while the image is being generated

message.generateFailed.description: Message displayed when image generation fails

message.uploadVideoExceed.message: The number of uploaded first frame images exceeds the limit
message.uploadVideoExceed.description: Error message when the number of uploaded first frame images exceeds the limit

message.uploadVideoSizeExceed.description: Error message when uploaded file size exceeds 10MB!

message.uploadVideoTypeFailed.message: Uploaded file must be in MP4 format!
message.uploadVideoTypeFailed.description: Error message when uploaded file is not in MP4 format!

message.uploadStartImageExceed.message: The number of uploaded first frame images exceeds the limit
message.uploadStartImageExceed.description: Error message when the number of uploaded first frame images exceeds the limit

message.uploadEndImageExceed.message: The number of uploaded last frame images exceeds the limit
message.uploadEndImageExceed.description: Error message when the number of uploaded last frame images exceeds the limit

message.uploadStartImageError.message: Failed to upload first frame image
message.uploadStartImageError.description: Error message when failed to upload the first frame image

message.uploadVideoError.description: Error message when failed to upload the video

message.uploadEndImageError.message: Failed to upload last frame image
message.uploadEndImageError.description: Error message when failed to upload the last frame image

message.uploadDocumentsError.description: Error message when failed to upload the document

message.noOperations.description: Message displayed when there are no available operations

message.noTasks.message: No history tasks, please click on the left to generate video
message.noTasks.description: Message displayed when there are no tasks
